      • getDatasetPage

      • buildAboutMetrics

        protected void buildAboutMetrics(int numDatasetsToLoad,
                     int numCountriesToLoad)
        populates the about field and optionally also loads the first requested datasets into the datasets property. This allows to only call the index service once effectively and process its response.
        Parameters:
        numDatasetsToLoad - number of datasets to load, if zero or negative doesnt load any

      • buildByMetrics

        protected void buildByMetrics(int numDatasetsToLoad,
                  int numCountriesToLoad)

      • loadAboutDatasetsPage

        protected int loadAboutDatasetsPage(int limit)
        Honors the offset paging parameter.
        Returns:
        the number of all datasets having data about this country

        protected int loadCountryPage(boolean isAboutCountry,
                  int limit)
